question: I have committed sodomy with my wife, we are muslim does it break up our Nikkah?
answer:
QUESTION

I have committed sodomy with my wife, we are muslim does it break up our Nikkah?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

 

It is a major sin to have intercourse in the back passage.

Nabi صلى الله عليه و سلم said:

 

حدثنا هناد عن وكيع عن سفيان عن سهيل بن أبى صالح عن الحارث بن مخلد عن أبى هريرة قال قال رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم ملعون من أتى امرأته فى دبرها  سنن أبى داود

Cursed is his who has intercourse with his wife in her back passage.

(Abu Dawood)

 

You should make sincere Tauba and refrain from such an evil act in future.

 

However this will not break the nikah.

And Allah knows best

Wassalamu Alaikum

Ml. Zakariyya bin Ahmed,
Student Darul Iftaa
